name: Gundead
description:
This is a practice project I worked on over my winter break.  My goal for this project was to improve on some of my existing scripts and learn a bit more about how Navigation2D works in Godot. While I'm not fully satisfied with how the final result turned out -- there were multiple things I hadn't looked into or known until too deep into the project -- I'm glad I learned what I did.

I'm going to spend some time figuring out funcref's, enemy states and a few other things  before my next project. My work has been very basic and I'd like to increase the scale a little bit. My plan is to make a Link's Awakening or Enter The Gungeon style dungeon crawler. Ideally I can get it out by March or April. We'll see what happens.
